0011000000000000 00 ; 03 00 Read n
1010000000001010 02 ; 10 10 JumpZ End
0101000000010000 04 ; 05 16 Add sum
0010000000010000 06 ; 02 16 Store sum
1001000000000000 08 ; 09 00 Jump Start
0001000000010000 10 ; 01 16 Load sum
0100000000000000 12 ; 04 00 Write
0000000000000000 14 ; 00 00 Stop
0000000000000000 16 ; 00 00 sum
